findEmail.description: Find your new hire's email address.

introduceYourself.description: Email your new hire with this template.

showUp.description: Show up to work on Monday and Tuesday if your buddy is in the same office as you, or offer to meet over video chat.

greetThem.description: Today will be intense for them, so say hi and offer to answer any questions they have. The time they leave orientation varies based on their location. D.C. gets out around 12PM ET; NY 9AM ET; Chicago 4:30 PM CT; and SF 9AM PT.

allHands.description: Help your buddy find the all hands meeting on Tuesday.

addToLists.description: Add your buddy to location-based mailing lists and calendars.

officeTour.description:
Sometimes the #teamops member in the office gives the tour instead, as in SF. Make sure they have a copy of their office guide:
  • Chicago
  • New York
  • Washington DC
  • San Francisco
  • Distributed
